data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 2,347,854 believers in New Jersey to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of New Jersey, United States
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of New Jersey, United States.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary: On average, 4 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next hour in New Jersey, United States.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of New Jersey, United States.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 4,453,181 people in the state of New Jersey who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Azerbaijani people. Make the Azerbaijani people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
There are 8,891,300 people living in the state of New Jersey. Only about 2,347,854 might be believers.
Spirit, teach the 2,347,854 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of New Jersey, United States has a population of 8,891,300.

We estimate New Jersey has 2,347,854 people who might know Jesus, 4,453,181 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,090,265 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of New Jersey.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.
